tweets.text: Photo from today. Capping still unfinished. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Don't try to tell us they did it on time, we have eyes. https://t.co/6HwgiXw9hB
@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids All looks so toxic #stopthestink
@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Is that new waste there that they are dumping? Thought they have suspended new waste.
@ShaunLintern thank you Shaun , can we just add that @EnvAgencyMids have basically said that red can carry on as usual and they're not going to strictly enforce any sanctions.

@HCoppins @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @PHE_uk Dread to think but the Lyme brook always seems to have a blue tinge that varies in brightness. Makes you really wonder what the hell is going into this monstrosity of a s**t heap

@EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Why was Adam Share ever given permission to be CEO of a landfill company? Criminal past for hacking your agency, yet you allow him to be in charge of this? Something doesn't fit here. https://t.co/MyHTVpo4ap

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA 
@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk what is that blue stuff that is being added to the landfill? More chemicals? The blue dust cloud from it might have been a pretty sight but what is it that we are being exposed to now??

The @EnvAgency deadline has passed and Walleys Quarry still stinks ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è what happens now @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @MPGeorgeEustice @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @BorisJohnson? Our children are breathing toxic air, when will it stop? #stopthestink

@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA really? BIG FAT FAIL. @RedIndustries2 the net is closing & you'll get your punishment (legally) for putting us through a living nightmare. Adam Share I hope you have your case packed there is a nice cosy cell waiting for you.
@StinkStopthe https://t.co/QMijol5TNJ
@EnvAgencyMids Pathetic, you are allowing our community to be poisoned. We will see you in court!

After their dereliction of duty they should have taken their spades & pitched in while hanging their heads in shame @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice #stopthestink https://t.co/j7EfkOGhEM
@EnvAgencyMids Jesus, you lot must be on some serious backhanders.

Chris, I have listened, asked questions, taken advice and spoken to our partners and agreed that vegetation clearance work in prep for the LORP should been postponed.  Any future works will be on basis that they will NOT impact breeding birds.  Can we work together on the future? https://t.co/t2mivnNqP2

@EnvAgencyMids Evidence based? How can you continue to receive so many complaints that you can‚Äôt cope, yet still look the other way for ‚Äòalternative‚Äô evidence. Here‚Äôs some facts for you...
1. It stinks
2. The EA is not doing enough
3. Red Industries are corrupt
4. The residents deserve better

@Samanth33412592 @EnvAgencyMids Completely agree. The test by smell by the EA experts is sufficiently scientific to meet their assessment criteria for deciding cell 1 was the problem area, but the test by smell of thousands of residents is somehow ignored / not appropriate for immediate action.

@Samanth33412592 @EnvAgencyMids In black and white. Human nose testing. Per Sarah Dennis, Environmental Agency in liaison committee meeting minutes 24/04/21. So can we move forward on the basis of tens of thousands of local residents determining offsite odour with their nose please. Immediate action is required https://t.co/9a0A6Ok3yT

This used to be a nice place to live @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK until rotten eggs,faeces,dirty nappies,burnt popcorn & rotting flesh started to burn our throats @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/hKhqv95Md9

urls.title: Hazwaste tycoon jailed for six months
urls.description: The chief executive and the marketing director of Atlantic Waste - a company bought by investment firm Augean in 2005 - have been jailed for hiring detectives to tap phones and hack into the computers of Environment Agency officers and council staff.
